GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.15.63
GSD.description:
net: genl: fix error path memory leak in policy dumping

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.63 by commit b0672895d8be5d19d4b05ac83f807026fc791037, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 50a896cf2d6f34e884a00139d6e6012c9833ace3. For more details please see the references link.
